name: Deadly drifting
description:
In Deadly Drifting you control a car which has to destroy other cars by drifting over them. When you drift, a energy wave comes out on the right side of your car and you can destroy other vehicles with it. Be careful because if a car touches you on your weak side, you will crash ! 

Important : Click on the screen when the game is loading.

An enemy car comes out ->Try to destroy it by drifting on it.An ennemy car touch you while you aren't drifting  ->Your car is destroyed :(You touch an entry ->Your car bounce in the opposite direction !Your car go out of the arena ->You respawn at the opposite side. Drift        Press A

The game was created by Matteo Benaissa in 3 hours for the Trijam 87 with the theme Keep drifting. (result : 1st out of 12). The cover art design is inspired from a Michelin ad of 1900.
